name: Design & Decoration Craft: Interior
description:
Free sandbox with unlimited generation of the game world, discover amazing biomes, from the snow-covered forests of the rocky mountains. A beautiful and magical world of the cubes, the craft and the search for resources, dark caves and dangerous mines, many blocks to create stunning buildings, various interior and decorations! You can build everything you want: from a cozy house to a majestic castle!
Completely free game for kids and adults, for boys and girls, explore the world, mining treasures and make new friends. A huge variety of characters waiting for you and your adventures!

- The game gives full access in the mode of creativity for the construction of any creative buildings.
- Explore caves and mines, extract treasures and make new friends.
- A variety of game characters inhabiting the cubic world.
- Many new beautiful blocks and pieces of furniture.
- And much more!!!
